definition: to arrange/to line up/file/series/(in data tables) column/(Tw) row
strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort

sentences.english: China was indeed humiliated by Western powers in its modern history.
sentences.chinese: 在近代史當中，中國的確受到了西方列強的侮辱。

sentences.english: The super powersattempt to redivide the world failed.
sentences.chinese: 列強企圖重新瓜分世界的計劃破滅了。

sentences.english: Christopher Columbus's voyages inspired other European powers to seek out the new world as well.
sentences.chinese: 哥倫布的航行激發了其它歐洲列強探尋新世界的慾望。

sentences.english: Africa was often parceled out among the European Powers.
sentences.chinese: 非洲曾一度被歐洲列強所瓜分。

sentences.english: European powers agree to end privateering.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲列強同意停止私掠船的行徑。

sentences.english: European powers no longer rule over great overseas dominions.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲列強再也不能統治大塊海外領地了。

sentences.english: The European powers extended their authority in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲列強在亞洲擴大他們的管轄權。

sentences.english: The invasions of the western imperialism powers shaked the legitimate foundation of this system.
sentences.chinese: 西方列強的入侵動搖了這一制度的合法性基礎。

sentences.english: The imperialist powers had pillaged lots of precious artworks.
sentences.chinese: 帝國主義列強掠奪了許多珍貴的藝術品。

sentences.english: Responses from these major powers were clearly full of indignation and discontentment.
sentences.chinese: 從列強反應來看，明顯充滿了憤怒和不滿。

sentences.english: The imperialist powers repeatedly forced the Qing government to cede territory and pay indemnities.
sentences.chinese: 帝國主義列強多次強迫清朝政府割地賠款。

sentences.english: Africa was once parcelled out among the European powers.
sentences.chinese: 非洲一度爲歐洲列強所瓜分。

sentences.english: The third one was making use of the conflict among big powers.
sentences.chinese: 三是利用列強之間的矛盾以夷制夷。
